meanings.definition: In a manner visible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent1: She looked at the stars megascopically, without needing a telescope.
meanings.sent2: The details of the painting were clear megascopically.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched megascopically as the bird flew by.
meanings.sent4: The mountain loomed megascopically in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher pointed out the answer on the board megascopically.

meanings.definition: With the ability to be seen without the aid of a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The megascopically sized insect caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The megascopically printed text was easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The megascopically large cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The megascopically clear water sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The megascopically painted mural brightened up the alley.
